Package com.rodolk.numserver.loggingprotocol

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataConsumer
    DataConsumer is an interface for a class that subscribes to ApplicationProtocol to consume the data read, parsed, and checkd for correctness.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationProtocol
    ApplicationProtocol manages the defined application protocol for a single connection.
    ArrayProvider
    ArrayProvider contains pre-allocated arrays to be used by other classes that need to read data or process data.
    ConnectedState
    ConnectedState is the main state where the protocol is reading data sent by the client.
    IdleState
    IdleState is the initial state and when process is called, it creates the BufferedReader to read from the socket.
    State
    State is an abstract class from which all state classes inherit.
    TerminateState
    TerminateState is trying to read the complete 'terminate\n' string.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ProtocolException.ErrorCode  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ProtocolException
    ProtocolException is used during the processing of the application protocol to indicate: READER_ERROR: if data received doesn't comply with the expected format or there is an error reading data.
